link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Share Capital = (Ordinary Shares + Convertible Preference Shares + Non-convertible Preference Shares)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Reserves and Surplus = (Capital Reserve + Debenture Redemption Reserve + Share Premium + General Reserves + Statutory/Special Reserve (Section 45-IC reserve to be shown separately below item no. + Reserves under Sec 45-IC of RBI Act 1934 + Revaluation Reserves + Share Application Money Pending Allotment + Other reserves + Balance of profit and loss account)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Secured Borrowings = (Debentures + Deferred credits + Borrowings from Banks + Borrowings from FIs + Borrowings from Government + Govt. Guaranteed Borrowings + Borrowings through CBLO/LAF + Borrowings from RBI + Other Borrowings + Interest accrued but not due on the above)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Unsecured Borrowings = (Borrowings from relatives of promoters / directors + Inter-corporate borrowings + Borrowings from Banks + Borrowings from FIs + Commercial paper + Debentures not in the nature of public deposit + Money received by way of caution money, margin money from the borrowers, lessee, hires or by way of security or advance from agents in the course of company's business or advance received against orders for supply of goods or properties or for redering services + Subordinated debts + Borrowings from Government + Govt. Guaranteed Borrowings + Call Money Borrowings + Borrowings from RBI + Borrowings from Holding Company + Other Borrowings + Interest accrued but not due on the above" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Borrowings = (Secured Borrowings + Un-Secured Borrowings)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Borrowings = (Borrowings payable more than 12 months + Borrowings payable more than 3 months but less than or equal to 12 months + Borrowings payable less than or equal to 3 months)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Current Liabilities = (Current Liabilities + Sundry Creditors + Liabilities to Subsidiaries & Holding Company + Deferred Tax Liabilities (Net) + Others)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Provision = (Provision for Standard Assets + Provisions Held for Non-Performing Assets + Provision for Diminution on Investments + For taxation + For contingencies + For pension, gratuity and similar staff benefit schemes contingencies + Proposed dividends)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Capital and Liabilities = (Share Capital + Reserves and Surplus + Secured Borrowings + Unsecured Borrowings + Current liabilities + Provisions + Other Liabilities)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Capital + Liabilities = Assets" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Loans and Advances = (Secured + Unsecured)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Loans and Advances = (Amount receivable within 3 months + Amount receivable within 3 to 12 months + Amount receivable more than 12 months)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Loans and Advances = (Inter-Corporate Loans + Bills Purchased & Discounted + Loans to Corporates + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Secured loans and advances + Unsecured loans and advances = (Inter-Corporate Loans + Bills Purchased & Discounted + Loans to Corporates + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Investments = (Total Long-Term Investments + Total Current Investments)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Long-term Investments = (Government securities and government guaranteed bonds including treasury bills + Equity shares + Preference shares + Debentures + Bonds + Units of mutual funds + Others)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Current Investments = (Government securities and government guaranteed bonds including treasury bills + Equity shares + Preference shares + Debentures + Bonds + Units of mutual funds + Commercial Paper + Stock in trade - financial + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Cash and Bank Balances = (Cash in Hand + Deposits with Banks + Others)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Other Current Assets = (Advance Taxes paid / Tax deducted at source + Interest Accrued On Investments + Deferred Tax Assets (Net) + Interest Accrued on Loans & Advances + Prepaid Expenses + Security Deposits + Sundry/Trade Debtors + Advances to Staff + Stock in trade oher than financial + Share Application Money + Others)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Assets = (Loans and Advances + Hire Purchase and Lease Assets + Investments + Cash and Bank Balances + Other current assets + Fixed assets + Assets Acquired in Satisfaction of Claims + Miscellaneous expenditure + Profit and Loss Account (Accumulated Loss) + Other assets)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Gross credit Exposure = (Standard assets + Sub-standard assets + Doubtful assets + Loss assets)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total NPAs = (Sub-standard assets + Doubtful assets + (iii) Loss assets)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Gross NPAs percentage = (Total NPAs * 100) / Gross credit exposure)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Net NPAs = (Total NPAs - Total provision held; Else Value of Net NPAs = 0, If Total NPAs < Total Provision held Amount)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Net credit exposure = (Gross credit exposure - Total provision held); Else Value of Net credit exposure = 0, If Gross credit exposure is less than Total Provision held Amount)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Net NPAs percentage = (Net NPAs * 100) / Net credit exposure)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Provision held for NPA = (Provision held for Sub-standard assets + Doubtful assets + Loss assets)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Fund based exposure = (Values for all Group/Associate/Related companies/Entities)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total fund based exposure = (Loans + Equity + Preference + Debentures + ICDs + CPs + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Non fund based exposure = (Values for all Group/Associate/Related companies/Entities)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Non fund based exposure = (LCs + Guarantees + Others]" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Equity shares should = (Foreign Institutional Investors + Foreign Direct Investments)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total foreign sources = (Equity shares + Borrowings + Bonds/Debentures + Others" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Financial Guarantees = (Financial Guarantees Issued to Stock Exchanges on Behalf of Stock Brokers + Other Financial Guarantees)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Investments in Capital Market = (Convertible Bonds and Debentures + Equities + Equity Oriented Mutual Funds + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Capital Market Exposure = (Advances to Capital Market (Fund based) + Advances to Capital Market (Non-fund based) + Investments in Capital Market)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Credit to Real Estate = (Direct + Indirect)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Direct exposure to real estate sector = (Residential Mortgages + Commercial Real Estate + Any Other)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Residential Mortgages = (Residential Mortgages - Individual Housing Loans + Residential Mortgages - All Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Commercial Real Estate = (Commercial Real Estate - Residential Housing (CRE-RH) + Commercial Real Estate - Other)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Indirect exposure to real estate sector = (Funded and Non-funded Exposures NHB and Housing Finance Companies (HFCs) + Any Other)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Investment = (Direct + Indirect)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Direct Investment = (Commercial Real Estate + Investments in MBS and other securitized exposures and + Any Other)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Indirect Investment = (Funded and Non-funded Exposures NHB and Housing Finance Companies (HFCs) + Any Other)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Investments in MBS and other securitized exposures = (Residential Real Estate + Commercial Real Estate)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Gross Advances = (Food Credit + Non-Food Credit) for number of accounts" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Gross Advances = (Food Credit + Non-Food Credit)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Non-Food Credit = Agriculture and Allied Activities + Industry + Services + Retail Loans + Other Non-food Credit, if any) for number of accounts" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Non-Food Credit = Agriculture and Allied Activities + Industry + Services + Retail Loans + Other Non-food Credit, if any)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Industry = (Micro and Small + Medium + Large + Others, if any) for number of accounts" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Industry = (Micro and Small + Medium + Large + Others, if any)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Services = (Transport Operators + Computer Software + Tourism, Hotel and Restaurants + Shipping + Professional Services + Trade + Commercial Real Estate + NBFCs + Aviation + Other Services) for number of accounts" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Services = (Transport Operators + Computer Software + Tourism, Hotel and Restaurants + Shipping + Professional Services + Trade + Commercial Real Estate + NBFCs + Aviation + Other Services)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Services = (Micro and Small + Medium + Large + Others, if any) for number of accounts" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Services = (Micro and Small + Medium + Large + Others, if any)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Retail Loans = (Housing Loans (incl. priority sector Housing) + Consumer Durables + Credit Card Receivables + Vehicle/Auto Loans + Education Loans + Advances against Fixed Deposits (incl. FCNR(B), etc.) + Advances to Individuals against Shares, Bonds + Advances to Individuals against Gold + Micro finance loan + Other Retail loans, if any) for number of accounts" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Retail Loans = (Housing Loans (incl. priority sector Housing) + Consumer Durables + Credit Card Receivables + Vehicle/Auto Loans + Education Loans + Advances against Fixed Deposits (incl. FCNR(B), etc.) + Advances to Individuals against Shares, Bonds + Advances to Individuals against Gold + Micro finance loan + Other Retail loans, if any)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Trade = (Wholesale Trade (other than Food Procurement) + Retail Trade) for number of accounts" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Trade = (Wholesale Trade (other than Food Procurement) + Retail Trade)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Advances (Outstanding) of Sheet Part 8 for Gross Advances = (Gross Credit Exposure of Sheet Part 8C)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Standard Advances of Sheet Part 8 for Gross Advances = (Standard assets of Sheet Part 8C)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Substandard Advances of Sheet Part 8 for Gross Advances = (Substandard assets of Sheet Part 8C)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Doubtful Advances of Sheet Part 8 for Gross Advances = (Doubtful assets of Sheet Part 8C)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Loss Advances of Sheet Part 8 for Gross Advances = (Loss assets of Sheet Part 8C)" do not tally.
Identity "Total Authorised Capital (a+b) = (Equity Share Capital + Preference Share Capital)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Debentures = (Subscribed by Retail Investors + Subscribed by Banks + Subscribed by NBFCs + Subscribed by Mutual Funds + Subscribed by Insurance Companies + Subscribed by Pension Funds + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Borrowings from Banks - Secured = Term Loans + Working Capital loans + Cash Credit + Overdraft)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Borrowings from Banks - Unsecured = Term Loans + Working Capital loans + Cash Credit + Overdraft)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Commercial Paper = (Subscribed by Retail Investors + Subscribed by Banks + Subscribed by NBFCs + Subscribed by Mutual Funds + Subscribed by Insurance Companies + Subscribed by Pension Funds + Others)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Debentures not in the nature of public deposit = (Subscribed by Mutual Funds + Subscribed by Banks + Subscribed by NBFCs + Subscribed by Insurance Companies + Subscribed by Pension Funds + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Advances against securities (Individuals) = (Against shares + Against bonds and debentures + Advances against other securities)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Advances to individuals on clean basis = (For investment in shares + For investment in IPOs + For investment in ESOPs + Convertible bonds and debentures + For investment in units of equity-oriented mutual funds)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Advances against securities (Corporates) = (Against shares + Against bonds and debentures + Advances against other securities)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Advances to stockbrokers = (Secured + Unsecured)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Advances to Capital Market = (Advances against securities (Individuals) + Advances to individuals on clean basis + Advances against securities (Corporates) + Advances to corporates on clean basis for meeting promoter's contribution to the equity of new companies in anticipation of raising resources + Advances to stockbrokers + Bridge loans to companies against expected equity flows / issues + All exposures to Venture Capital Funds + Other fund based advance to Capital Market)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Gross NPAs at end of the quarter = (Gross NPAs at begining of the quarter + New Accretion to NPAs Reduction (-) / Addition due to RBI Instructions and/or any other Reason during this quarter from Standard Advances during this quarter + Up-gradation during this quarter + Actual Recoveries (in this quarter) + Write-off amount (in this quarter))" do not tally.
